entry.title: love is complementary and contradictory
entry.content:
Love is about you, but not merely you.

Love is about him, but not merely him.

Love is not business talk, not causal chat, but mental construction.

Neither of you can lay bricks and print the house.

Cooperation required, love is an artwork fragile but delicate.

entry.title: love is romantic but profound
entry.content:
Love is not only romantic but more profound.

Gathering for happiness is not from love.

Separating for individuality is not from love.

Love is together, seeking happiness from tolerance and delayed satisfaction.

Love is apart, suffering nostalgia from reflection and upgraded personality.

entry.title: 音乐
entry.content: 命中注定-孙楠
